ext.config.title: HTTP Proxy Server Configuration
ext.config.port:
The port that the HTTP proxy server listens on.
if `empty`, it will use a random available port.
ext.config.target:
The target url that the HTTP proxy server will proxy to.
if `empty`, it will prompt to enter a valid URL.
cmd.start.title: Start HTTP proxy
cmd.stop.title: Stop HTTP proxy
tip.enter_url: Please enter the 'url' you want to proxy to. eg. `http://example.com`
